name: Version 29
body:
PLEASE READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING!!!

This is the Miyamoto release for New Super Mario Bros. U for the Nintendo Wii U.
If you are modding New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe for the Nintendo Switch, get the other v29 release.

If you don't have a "data" folder already (not to be confused with "miyamotodata"), download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

data.zip:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v14/data.zip

Make sure you download the Main Tileset Pack from below and extract its contents to "miyamotoextras"!
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v28/Main_Tilesets_Pack.zip

Download NSMBU and NSLU objects from here:
https://www.mediafire.com/?uj2b2szy7eytyz3

Changelog coming soon!

name: Version 26 Beta - 29/7/2018
body:
PLEASE READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING!!!

This is a beta version that has been made on 29/7/2018 but was never published until now.

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

data.zip:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v14/data.zip

Download NSMBU and NSLU objects from here:
https://www.mediafire.com/?uj2b2szy7eytyz3

Changelog can be found here:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TuvVrVYmki3FyXTJHwXPi2BQxYT4ofPFEUxV0Wtn8bo/edit?usp=sharing

name: Version 25
body:
PLEASE READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING!!!

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

data.zip:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v14/data.zip

Download NSMBU and NSLU objects from here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v16/Objects.zip

Please download the randomized objects below as well and extract them to where you extracted Objects.zip:
https://www.mediafire.com/?ubeooe6155yx85c

Changelog:
* Improved loading times drastically.
* Improved saving times drastically.
* Added more options for SZS compression level.
* Fixed importing areas.
* Fixed painting reversed tower slopes.
* Updated the spritedata for lots of sprites.
* Made the Unknown Flag in the Zone settings checked by default.
* The Music is now set to "Overworld" by default.
* Gave the Unknown Flag in the Zone settings a name.
* Added a preview image for the "Lava 2" background.
* No externel programs are used now.
* Fixed an issue which occurs if the user selects the wrong (empty) Objects folder.
* Major and Minor bugfixes.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Added even more sprite images, including:
* Grrrol Passage (52)
* Fish Bone (57)
* Movement-controlled Piranha Plant (62)
* Flame Chomp (85)
* Urchin (86)
* Mega Urchin (99)
* Rotating Bill Cannon (103)
* Peach's Castle Door (107)
* Bowser Door (111)
* Medium Cheep Cheep (113)
* Big Spinner (117)
* Lakitu (119)
* Spine Coaster (133)
* Movement-controlled Bar Center (157)
* Bob-omb (164)
* Bullet Bill Cannon (171)
* Raising/lowering Bullet Bill Cannon (172)
* Snake Block (222)
* Stretching Mushroom Platform (257 / 258)
* Big Cannon (260)
* Stretch Block (284 / 285)
* Continuous Burner (289)
* Moving Stone Block (350)
* 3x3 Ice Block (393)
* Wobby Bone Platform (457)
* Movement-controlled Tower Block (524)
* Big Buzzy Beetle (606)

name: Version 24
body:
PLEASE READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING!!!

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

data.zip:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v14/data.zip

Download NSMBU and NSLU objects from here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v16/Objects.zip

Please download the randomized objects below as well and extract them to where you extracted Objects.zip:
https://www.mediafire.com/?ubeooe6155yx85c

Changelog:
* Fixed a bug in exporting objects.
* Updated libyaz0 to v0.4 which allows for faster level saving.
* Updated the spritedata for sprites 182 and 186.
* Added new and improved some sprite images.
* Updated Puzzle NSMBU to v2.7.
* Fixed sprite 298 sprite image. (Two coins)
* Updated some values in the Nabbit Path editor.
* Minor bug fixes.

name: Version 23
body:
Changelog:
* Added a new theme previewer in Miyamoto Preferences.
* Added loading the last loaded level.
* Updated the spritedata for some sprites including: sprite 237, sprite 346, sprite 544, sprite 673, sprite 703.
* Fixed loading some levels.
* Fixed a bug where not the right object was deleted.
* Tilesets will now resave only if changes where made to the Embedded tab (used an object from All tab / imported an object / deleted an object).
* Added an option to always resave the tilesets, even if no changes where made to the Embedded tab.
* Updated Puzzle NSMBU to v2.6.
* Liquids, snow effect, lava particles, and fog now only show if "Real View" is enabled.
* Fixed loading tilesets on macOS.
* DRASTICALLY improved importing objects.
* Fixed a bug where some levels don't get added to the Recent Files menu.
* Added setting the start entrance for the level.
* Added loading game patches.
* Added New Super Luigi U as a game patch.
* Fixed saving levels on macOS.
* Editing tileset slots is back!
* Fixed unloading tilesets.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Added even more sprite images, including:
* Tile God (237, 673)
* Blooper (313)
* Blooper Nanny with Babies (322)
* Bony Beetle (443)
* Boo (218)
* Boo Circle Boo (220)
* Boo Circle (221, 703)
* Deep Cheep (588)
* Spiny Cheep Cheep (120)
* Clampy (298)
* Big Glow Block (232)
* Rocky Wrench (536)
* Spike (180)
* Stone Spike (579)
* Thwimp (303)
* Enemy Generator for Pipe (98)
* Cooligan Generator for Pipe (335)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The following sprite images where either improved or replaced:
* Candle (96)
* Cheep Cheep (101, 615)
* Coin in Bubble (281)
* Fog (92)
* Floating Bubble (251)
* Goomba (0)
* Koopa Troopa (19, 55)
* Koopa Paratroopa (20, 21)
* Lamp (96)
* Rising Lava Particle Generator (201)
* Final Bowser (473)
* Micro Goomba (255)
* Monty Mole (51)
* Moving Acorn Plains Land Block (72)
* Note Block (295)
* Non-solid-when-you-have-P-Acorn Block (612)
* Paragoomba (1)
* Snow Effect (198)
* Floating Snowy Box (427)
* Stone-Eye (150)
* River Piranha Plant (64)
* Amp (270)
* Large Amp (270)
* Bowser (462)
* Bowser Bridge Piece (464)
* Bowser Shutter (467)
* Bowser Switch (520)
* Bump-from-below Platform (407)
* Castle Boss Door (110)
* Cooligan (334)
* Underground Crystal Block (316)
* Moving Mushroom Platform (544)
* Pipe Venus Fire/Ice Trap (6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13)
* Fliprus (441)
* Buzzy Beetle (22)
* Spike Top (352)

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

data.zip:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v14/data.zip

Download NSMBU and NSLU objects from here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v16/Objects.zip

Please download the randomized objects below as well and extract them to where you extracted Objects.zip:
https://www.mediafire.com/?ubeooe6155yx85c

name: Version 22 Bugfix
body:
This is a litte bugfix release for v22 that doesn't deserve a whole new version.

Changelog:
* Fixed a major bug where Miyamoto tries to save nonexistent Nabbit path nodes.

All you need to do is extract this to where Miyamoto v22 is and replace the files.

You can find v22 here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/tag/v22

name: Version 22
body:
Changelog:
* Added a hotkey to activate quickpaint mode.
* Fixed up the ui size for the Quick Paint Tool.
* Improved the preview widget (Quick Paint Tool).
* Quick Paint Tool now resets when changing current area.
* Added a warning to display when objects don't exist in loaded preset (Quick Paint Tool).
* Added exporting and deleting all objects.
* Use libyaz0 for decompressing SZS files which allows for a nice tiny speed boost.
* Fixed sprite 140 (Painted).
* Separated Nabbit Path (Path 90) to a new tab.
* Added a Nabbit Path editor.
* Added viewing and editing level information.
* Added a fast Yaz0 compressor.
* Fixed a bug where the theme selector is not set as the current theme in Miyamoto Preferences.
* Added setting the paths visiblity.
* Disabled "Events" and "Comments" tabs.
* Updated the file types in the Open/Save as/Import dialogs.
* Major and minor bugfixes.

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

data.zip:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v14/data.zip

Download NSMBU and NSLU objects from here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v16/Objects.zip

Please download the randomized objects below as well and extract them to where you extracted Objects.zip:
https://www.mediafire.com/?ubeooe6155yx85c

name: Version 19
body:
Changelog:
* Fixed saving for Linux and probably MacOSX too.
* Fixed sprite 407's sprite image.
* Fixed editing the level's timer.
* Fixed missing vines for entrances.
* Added importing objects.
* The "Embedded" tab will always be enabled now.
* Minor bugfixes.

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

data.zip:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v14/data.zip

Download NSMBU and NSLU objects from here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v16/Objects.zip

name: Version 19 Bugfix
body:
This is a litte bugfix release for v19 that doesn't deserve a whole new version.

Changelog:
* Fixed a major bug where Miyamoto doesn't run if the Objects folder disappears.

All you need to do is extract this to where Miyamoto v19 is and replace the files.

You can find v19 here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/tag/v19

name: Version 18 Bugfix
body:
This is a litte bugfix release for v18 that doesn't deserve a whole new version.

Changelog:
* Fixed a small sprite listing.
* Fixed a bug where tilesets between areas get messed up.
* Fixed a bug where the All tab doesn't update when changing the
area/loading another level and starts painting non-existent or missing objects.
* Updated the entrance types.
* Minor bugfixes.

All you need to do is extract this to where Miyamoto v18 is and replace the files.

You can find v18 here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/tag/v18

name: Version 18
body:
Changelog:
* Fixed reversed slopes properties.
* Added a feature to tell the user if the object is undeletable.
* The number of free tiles now shows in the bottom left corner.
* Fixed objects duplicating.
* Minor bug fixes.

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

data.zip:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v14/data.zip

Download NSMBU and NSLU objects from here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v16/Objects.zip

name: Version 17.5
body:
Changelog:
* Improved saving tilesets.
* Simplifed the Area Options dialog.
* Removed tileset reloading.
* Minor bug fixes.

Get v17 and overwrite it with this one.

v17:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/tag/v17

name: Version 17
body:
Changelog:
* Added objects preloading.
* Added snapping zone to grid.
* Fixed painting stamps (and comments).
* Added sprite images for liquids, snow effect, lava particals, and fog.
* Fixed/added themes.
* Added animations rendering for ? blocks, brick blocks, dash coins and conveyors.
* Fixed collision overlays.
* Fixed sprite 176's sprite image.
* Cleaned up the code.

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

data.zip:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v14/data.zip

Download NSMBU and NSLU objects from here:
https://github.com/aboood40091/Miyamoto/releases/download/v16/Objects.zip

name: Version 16
body:
Changelog:
* Added importing and exporting objects in Puzzle.
* Fixed a few bugs in Puzzle.
* Added new Icons for Puzzle.
* Added more sprite images.
* Updated the sprite data.
* Cleaned up the code.

name: Version 15
body:
Changelog:
* Added item containing blocks to the palette.
* New Overrides and coins.
* New BG Options Dialog.
* Added more sprite images.
* Few minor changes and bug fixes.

name: Version 14
body:
Changelog:
* Fix typo in Object Data Editor.
* Added Expanding Pipes, Bushes, Palm Trees, and Pendulums.
* Added a new updated Zone Options Dialog.
* Fixed Timers and added a limit to possible values.
* Updated Overrides and Pa0 Objects descriptions.
* Improved Tileset editing.
* Added a new feature that creates a Level by itself.

Update: Please download the Bugfix below too! Extract it and replace the files.

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

name: Version 13
body:
Changelog:
* Added Windows x86 version.
* Fixed Importing/deleting areas for new levels.
* Updated Sprite Data.
* Added Grop's Object Data Editor back.
* Fixed a bug in Grop's Object Data Editor.
* Added *a ton* of sprite images.
* You can now add custom sprites to the level by putting them in a folder named "custom" inside the data folder.

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

name: Version 12.5
body:
Changelog:
* Added Windows x86 version.
* Fixed Importing/deleting areas for new levels.
* Updated Sprite Data.
* You can now add custom sprites to the level by putting them in a folder named "custom" inside the data folder.

If you don't have a data folder already, download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

name: Version 12 - Shiny
body:
Big release!

Changelog since v11:
* Improved the BG Options Dialog (You can add a BG for each Zone now)
* Improved saving. (The necessary sprite files will be automatically added to the level)
* Added making New Levels.
* Added adding new Areas.
* Fixed importing Areas.
* Stopped deleting Areas from saving the level twice. (For the sake of saving time)
* The MacOS version is finally functional! (Binary to be added in the next release)
* Removed the dependency for Wine.
* Fixed some sprite images.
* Added an option to export Tilesets in Puzzle Tileset Editor.
* A lot of other things that I forgot to list here... 😛

You need to download data.zip from below and extract it to folder named "data" in the same place as Miyamoto!.

name: Version 11.0 - Trippy
body:
Added more images, fixed pokey, and merged code for all devices.

Linux users need WINE.

name: Version 10.0 - Kronos
body:
Changelog since v9.0:
* Added BG Translations.
* Improved Handling BGs
* Added A LOT of sprite images
* Fixed Puzzle Tileset Editor

name: Version 9.5 - Kuppa
body:
* Added BG Translations.
* Added a few sprite images
* Fixed Puzzle

name: Version 6.0 - Star
body: Added Tileset Replacing, Quicker loading, SARC Tools, and more probably.

name: Version 3.5 - Gattaca
body: Added stone eyes, and EXPORTING!!!! Woo!

name: Version 3.0 - Shadow
body: Added mushroom platforms, big pipes, and painted pipes.

name: Version 2.0 - Lucid
body: Added flagpoles, pokeys (sort-of), tower cogs, liquids, and more.

name: Version 1.0 - Xevious
body:
Added more sprites and saving!

Releases will include a windows executable (wine friendly) and a linux executable! (May need python 3.5 installed with TPLLib, Pyqt5, and QtRibbon.
